name: Cosmos Comet!
description:
You must dodge asteroids and other space mysteries as you try to survive open space! Use touch Input/Mouse to control. Leave all criticism and feedback in the comments it is wanted!

 Background: I am an hobbyist game developer who is about to start work on my first big game inspired by the legend of Zelda series (LTTP) with a focus on great combat. So look out for that.
